730871f-a.title: Bridges - Manhattan Bridge - [Construction.]
730871f-a.text:
Manhattan Bridge: was begun October 1, 1901 and opened December 31, 1909. The total cost of land and construction being 431, 084, 705.
Three views showing the tower.
NAY BE REPRODECED  September 7, 1908

730896f-a.title: Bridges - Manhattan Bridge - [Brooklyn shore.]
730896f-a.text:
The Manhattan Bridge and its Brooklyn shore as photographed from
South Street in Manhattan.
1939
Alexander Alland
This photo is one of a series that appeared in the published volume "Portrait of N. Y.' by Felix Reisenberg and Alex. Alland, IRGV.
